title: Did Robert Plant have a relationship with Alannah Myles? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well it really doesn't seem to be any kind of a secret that Alannah Myles dated music arranger Robert Plant back in 1990. And while not quite admitting anything about a love affair, Robert Plant finally said about Alannah Myles that, they're good friends and that he thinks the world of her. That she's a great, powerful lady, has one of the finest voicest of the idiom. And that she was always very kind to him as well as very warm-hearted... also stating, "But the road is the road". There’ve been rumors that Alannah Myles was his muse of “29 Palms” as she was Plant’s former backing singer and vocalist for the recording of his number one hit song “Black Velvet.” Plant has actually admitted not only that “29 Palms” was written on tour, at the time they were in California” but he's also confessed that his song was, his "ideal-love-affair-gone-wrong song". So while there's no real proof one way or the other, there is Robert’s beautiful love gone wrong song.
